title: Orchid
description: Orchid by Jayne Ann Krentz Written As Jayne Castle. Copyright 1998 Jayne Ann Krentz. P 1999 Books On Tape, Inc. Unabridged. Library Edition. 4929 (7 cassettes/over 10 hours). Read by Mary Peiffer. "A top psychic for Psynergy Inc. on the space colony of St. Helens, Orchid Adams is far too exotic to settle for an ordinary man. It's just as well because she's client. Rafe Stonebraker, and he's definitely not marriage material. An unlicensed private eye with an edgy reputation and awesome psychi talents. Rafe has some serious secrets. Not only is he trying to solve a strange theft, he is fighting to ward off a hostile takeover at Stonebraker Shipping, the family business. He needs a wife and fast - to salvage his credibility. Orchid doesn't fit the profile he had in mind, but then opposites often attract. As danger and intrigue swirl around them the two must find a way to work together before a ruthless killer closes in. "Jayne Ann Krentz, writting as Jayne Jayne Castle is one of the hottest writers in romance today. (USA Today)" (from back)
author: Jayne Castle
